description:
Nirvana... A fearsome magic that switches darkness and light! Lucy and Hibiki, who knows about this, hurry to chase after Natsu and Erza, but one of Oracion Seis, the Celestial Wizard Angel, stands in their way! Lucy can`t stand the way that Angel thinks of her Spirits as nothing more than tools. But before the more powerful Angel, Lucy is brought to her knees! Her back to the wall, facing defeat, Lucy`s feelings for her Spirits call forth something amazing...
Source: crunchyroll
